com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.state

Class DispatchingStateBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.state.DispatchingStateBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the state object to build.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventOutChannel, StateBuilder<T>, java.util.function.Consumer<Event>, java.util.function.Supplier<Optional<T>>

    public final class DispatchingStateBuilder<T>
extends Object
implements StateBuilder<T>
    StateBuilder that dispatches events to state-building methods on a given class/instance.
